nodes.text: A crown prince was a Human male member of House Panteer, the royal family of the planet Alderaan. Around 3703 BBY, the prince was arranged to marry a girl from House Organa, but a young Jedi discovered that the bride was in fact a daughter of House Thul—the child had been switched at birth with an Organa infant. The Jedi stopped the wedding and exposed the Thuls' treachery, resulting in their exile.
The crown prince, whose name was never identified, was first mentioned in the House Thul Codex entry in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
